MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH55 postcode area of Addiewell. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:51pm due to damaged electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:57pm on Saturday, 13 February 2021
